function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"No significant association found between gardening and physical health change scores.","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the impact of gardening on physical health in the context of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Further research and analysis to determine the true impact of gardening on physical health during the pandemic.","Technologies":"Research studies, statistical analysis methods","People":"Individuals interested in the relationship between gardening and physical health during the pandemic","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"No significant association found between garden usage and change in emotional and mental health.","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the impact of garden usage on emotional and mental health during lockdown.","Mitigation":"Further investigation and qualitative research to explore the potential benefits of garden usage on emotional and mental well-being.","Technologies":"Qualitative research methods, in-depth interviews, psychological assessments","People":"Individuals experiencing emotional and mental challenges during lockdown","Owner":"Psychological researchers, mental health practitioners"},{"Description":"No significant association found between gardening and perceived change in sleep quality since lockdown started.","Impact":"Uncertainty about the role of gardening in influencing sleep quality during the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Conduct longitudinal studies and sleep quality assessments to examine the relationship between gardening and sleep quality over time.","Technologies":"Longitudinal research designs, sleep monitoring devices, sleep quality questionnaires","People":"Individuals interested in promoting better sleep quality during the pandemic","Owner":"Sleep researchers, health organizations"}]}
